previous.excerpt:
It’s unlikely this has any major ramifications for FB stock at the moment but
looking long term, TikTok is a major competitor that has the ability to divert
young smartphone holders away from FB.

https://www.searchenginejournal.com/tiktok-beats-facebook-in-time-spent-per…
previous.title: TikTok finally beat $FB in monthly time spent on the platform per user

localize.title: TikTok终于在每个用户每月在平台上花费的时间上击败了Facebook。
localize.the_new_excerpt:
目前来看，这对FB股票不太可能有什么重大影响，但
从长远来看，TikTok是一个主要的竞争对手，有能力分流。
年轻的智能手机持有者远离FB。

https://www.searchenginejournal.com/tiktok-beats-facebook-in-time-spent-per...

localize.title: TikTok終於在每個用戶每月在平臺上花費的時間上擊敗了Facebook。
localize.the_new_excerpt:
目前來看，這對FB股票不太可能有什麼重大影響，但
從長遠來看，TikTok是一個主要的競爭對手，有能力分流。
年輕的智能手機持有者遠離FB。

https://www.searchenginejournal.com/tiktok-beats-facebook-in-time-spent-per...
